body_html: Older versions of Cuda are handled as a if it works that is nice but not supported. Not to pass this around but I think Amit might have a table he was going to publish to show compatibility. @av8ramit And agreed, we should post something if we have not and if we could make it clear in the release notes that would be useful.

body: Older versions of Cuda are handled as a if it works that is nice but not supported.  Not to pass this around but I think Amit might have a table he was going to publish to show compatibility.  @av8ramit And agreed, we should post something if we have not and if we could make it clear in the release notes that would be useful.
